content: stringery knotted tea towel crochet pattern 1 copyright 2024 jenna s knotted tea towel pattern all rights reserved materials -sport cotton yarn in two different colors 180 yards each -4mm hook before beginning please read the pattern all the way through before beginning the towel can be made bigger or longer if you d like just make sure to have extra yardage *note any turning chain 2 are not worked* size 8 5 inches/ 21 5 cm wide 13 5 inches/34 3mm long on one side abbreviations sts stitches picot chain 3 and slip_stitch into the chain chain first chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet 2 copyright 2024 jenna s knotted tea towel pattern all rights reserved pattern chain 40 +2 turn row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and 39 double_crochet to end of the row row 2 chain 4 skip 1 st double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 st double_crochet x19 times row 3 chain 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 39 sts row 4 chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts double_crochet 3 in next st skip 2 sts repeat 5x double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet skip 1 st double_crochet row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 chain 4 double_crochet next st and 3rd st together leaving one st between them chain 2 double_crochet 3 sts together repeat 5 times double_crochet first and 3rd of the next sts together chain double_crochet in last st row 7 repeat row 3 repeat row 2-7 2 times more repeat row 2 and 3 one more time make a picot edge if you d prefer make two pieces the same and face them together sew 10 sts together on each side leaving a 20 st wide hole in the center when using your towel place it over the towel bar and pull the back half through the hole to the front 3 copyright 2024 jenna s knotted tea towel pattern all rights reserved i hope you enjoy your crocheting @the_stringery https //stringystudio etsy com 4 copyright 2024 jenna s knotted tea towel pattern all rights reserved
